price: Na sε wͻantie wo a, ka sε: “Medeε matwe me ho afri dwuma a modie no ho “.
arabic: فَإِنۡ عَصَوۡكَ فَقُلۡ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-in ʿaṣawka faqul innī barīon mimmā taʿmalūna
